articles.title: South Korea reports 1st possible case of viral pneumonia

articles.title: Official: Military helicopter crash kills 2 in Afghanistan
articles.description: An Afghan military helicopter has crashed in the country's western Farah province, killing the two pilots on board
articles.content:

An Afghan military helicopter crashed on Wednesday in the country's western Farah province, killing the two pilots on board, a defense ministry official said.

articles.title: German factory orders down 1.3% in November
articles.description: German factory orders dropped 1.3% in November compared with the previous month They were pushed down by a drop in foreign demand and low bulk orders
articles.content:
BERLIN -- 
German factory orders dropped 1.3% in November compared with the previous month, pushed down by a drop in foreign demand and low bulk orders.

articles.title: Australian PM's leadership criticized during wildfire crisis
